import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { useFetch } from '../../Utils/useFetch' import './Cart.css' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' export const CartProduct = ( { product } ) =>{ //console.log(product) const [idChecked, setIdChecked] = useState([]) const { removeFromCart } = useContext(ShopContext) console.log(idChecked) return(

{product.title}

{/* Quantidade: */}

R$:{product.price},00

) }
